atk-s0403a18:0_0: (The wilderness should be expanded like this.)
atk-s0403a18:1_0: While staying in the wilderness is colorful and beautiful,
atk-s0403a18:2_1: Once it’s because of stupidity and folly.
atk-s0403a18:2_2: Someone who has dugiously created by themselves to be happy.
atk-s0403a18:2_3: wanting to stay in the wilderness, they think: ‘May I live in remote lodgings.’ While living in the wilderness, ate only alms-food, wore rag robes, and owned just as one who wants to train.’ Then they wished: ‘May they set out on a reconcile as long as they wished.’ Then they wished like this: ‘May they live in such a way of it, may I live in harmony.’
atk-s0403a18:2_5: Though the wild colt named the Buddha, the name of the Buddha, and the wilderness.
atk-s0403a18:2_7: This is what I need to do, but only when I say.
atk-s0403a18:2_8: Don’t regret others back to the beginning.
